long_description: Equipped with a skeg, bulkheads and everything you need to grow your paddling skills, the Necky Rip 12 is a lively, playful kayak designed to boost confidence and skill in new paddlers. A fine choice for large paddlers, 12 ft. length offers a touch more speed and high capacity than its smaller, 10 ft. counterpart. Sharp keel promotes glide, a moderate rocker makes the boat easy to maneuver and drop-down skeg enhances tracking in rough water. Tough and affordable polyethylene hull provides long-lasting wear and resists UV degradation; molded-in graphics won't peel or fade. Adjustable seat flexes with each paddle stroke, promoting comfort whether you're paddling hard or taking it easy; cup holder keeps a beverage close by. Thigh pads on the coaming offer comfort and control, adjustable foot pedals accommodate different size paddlers and generously-sized cockpit allows easy entry and exit. Cross-Lock buckle system on hatch secures cover easily even if you have cold hands; a gasket seals out water and keeps a tight fit. Bungee deck rigging at bow and stern secures extra gear on board; toggle carry handles offer convenient transport of the kayak to and from the water. The Necky Rip 12 Kayak with Skeg weighs 49 lb.
short_description: Equipped with a skeg, bulkheads and everything you need to grow your paddling skills, the Necky Rip 12 is a lively, playful kayak designed to boost confidence and skill in new paddlers.
